channel.title: Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: AppSource
item.description: Test & Purchase AppSource Our app is available for download from Microsoft AppSource. After installation, you have the option of testing our app for 30 days. We would like to point out that fees may be incurred even during the trial period. The costs incurred can be requested via E-Mail. If you like the app and its range of functions, you can purchase licenses for a fee at any time using our order form.
